item.description:
Nice weather is expected this weekend so why not get out and hit some balls!! All ability levels are welcome to participate. This group is about meeting new people, staying active and enjoying some sunshine.

Saturday at 9 am is the time to meet. If you're new, look for the group congregating at the center bleachers or look for a bandana tied to the fence of the section we're playing in. Bring something to drink.

In the event that the courts are in use when we get there, plan to detour over to the Wolcott Park courts on New Britain Avenue, just a few blocks from Conard.

Send me a note if you have questions. Looking forward to seeing you there.

Jim
item.how_to_find_us: Blue Nike Hat & I look like my photo

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Tennis - April 25 - Saturday
